name: Staked Ethos Reserve Note
description: stERN is a liquid and composable interest-bearing stablecoin with built-in access to blue-chip yield and exposure to market volatility through liquidation income through Ethos Reserve. ERN (Ethos Reserve Note) is a decentralized stablecoin used to pay out loans made through the Ethos Reserve protocol. It can be redeemed for underlying collateral at any time.
